sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Florus Anglicus: or An exact history of England, from the raign of William the Conqueror to the death of the late King. / By Lambert Wood gent. Florus Anglicus. English Bos, Lambert van den, 1610-1698.
[14], 271, [1] p.
Printed for Simon Miller at the Starre in St Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1657. [i.e. 1656]
Lambert Wood = Lambert van den Bos. Originally published in 1650 in Latin. Annotation on Thomason copy: "nouemb: 1st"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Florus Anglicus: or An exact history of England, from the raign of William the Conqueror to the death of the late King. / By Lambert Wood gent. Florus Anglicus. English Bos, Lambert van den, 1610-1698.
[14], 271, [1] p.
Printed for Simon Miller at the Starre in St Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1657. [i.e. 1656]
Lambert Wood = Lambert van den Bos. Originally published in 1650 in Latin. Annotation on Thomason copy: "nouemb: 1st"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Simon Miller
the Starre in St Pauls Church-yard.
>>>>>>> imprintparse
